- autoreload for plumber
- auto-refresh the browser when a change is made
- run hotwater from the commandline via included bash script

## Installation

You can install the development version of hotwater from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ElianHugh/hotwater")
```

## Example

Hotwater can be run via an R session:

``` r
hotwater::run(
    system.file("examples", "plumber.R", package = "hotwater"),
    port = 9999L
)
```


# Package index

## All functions

- [`cli`](https://elianhugh.github.io/hotwater/reference/cli.md) : Run
  hotwater from the command line
- [`install_hotwater()`](https://elianhugh.github.io/hotwater/reference/install_hotwater.md)
  : Install global hotwater script
- [`run()`](https://elianhugh.github.io/hotwater/reference/run.md) :
  Start a hotwater engine
- [`uninstall_hotwater()`](https://elianhugh.github.io/hotwater/reference/uninstall_hotwater.md)
  : Uninstall global hotwater script
